name: Orbiter (itch) (TheBananaDev)
description:
Try To Dodge Asteroids While Making Sure You Don't Run Out Of Fuel

Tips:

- You Die If You Go Too Far Left 

- Make Sure To Catch Any Flying Fuel Pods To Replenish Your Energy

- Your Rocket Is Gravitationally Attracted To Asteroids

- The Top And Bottom Teleport You To The Opposite Side

Controls:

Thrust - W

Steering - A and D
